features: Total Weight: short - 3 lbs. 9 oz (1610 g) / reg - 3 lbs. 14 oz (1756 g) / long - 4 lbs. 5 oz (1959 g) / extra long - 4 lbs. 12 oz (2150 g)
Stuffsack Size: short, reg, long - 10" x 18" (25.4 cm x 45.7 cm) / extra long - 11" x 20" (27.9 cm x 50.8 cm)
shell: 50D 100% recycled polyester ripstop with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
Fully recycled materials feature embossed lining for enhanced aesthetic appeal
100% recycled synthetic insulation provides warmth even when wet
Extended width in knees for maximum comfort and mobility
Wraparound J-zip allows for increased mobility and venting
Fitted hood for warmth and comfort
Draft collar for comfort and preventing heat loss
Tie-down loops for securing bag to sleeping pad
